mng: lump (of earth), chunk, piece, classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc, (coll.) classifier for money and currency units

exm.mng: one block, one piece, one (unit of money), together, in the same place, in company
block, slab, tectonic plate, continental plate
module (in software), functional unit, component part
heavy man, fat man, lunkhead, lummox, lug
cube, block, square, rectangle, diamond ♦ (in card games)
